Title: Family Ties
Plot: In an effort to get to the bottom of things, Michael tracks Nellie down and hires her as a consultant for the Bluth Co. Unfortunately, Michael discovers Nellie's hands-on approach is more than he bargained for.
GuestStars: Tom Saunders, Ron Riggle, Mark Mueller, Ben Carroll, Olanrewaju Idewu, Charlie Hartsock, Bronwen Masters, Justine Bateman
